startCard.title: Brand or Organization
startCard.description: If your brand is established and you're looking for continuous support, get started now.

home.title: Create your profile and take the first step towards new opportunities
home.description: By creating your account, you'll gain access to a thriving community where brands and individuals are committed to offering you ongoing support. This support network will empower you with the resources, guidance, and connections you need to succeed, ensuring that youâ€™re never alone on your journey

success.create: Registration successful! Proceeding to next step...
success.update: Registration updated successfully! Proceeding to next step...

error.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
error.server: Server error. Please try again later.

step1.title: Basic Info
step1.subTitle: Tell about your Brand/organization
step1.description: Provide an overview of the brand or organization you want to register on 3F.

validation.name: Brand/Organisation name is required
validation.brandTags: At least one brand tag is required
validation.terms: You must agree to the terms of service

mission.title: What is the primary mission or objective of your brand/organization?
mission.description: Be more specific about it, as it will be published as your deck on the 3F(150-300 characters). read more

social.title: Help your contributors find you faster (at least 3 options)
social.description: Connect your socials so the contributors get to know you better and find you faster.
